promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a chibi cute simple goat fighting-type pokemon with regal antlers. It can be found in ruins-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, fighting or goat. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Antlicute, a a chibi cute simple goat fighting-type pokemon. It can be found in ruins-like environments It has the following abilities: Sand Pulse. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "goat", "fighting" or "Antlicute". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of fighting-type pokemon, goat-like, simple, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, orange and blue ambient lighting
generatedDescription: This energetic little creature thrives in ancient, sandy ruins. Antlicute uses its Sand Pulse ability to ward off foes while playfully bounding through its domain.
